ing.item: Diced red or green apples; (about 2 apples)
Melted butter or margarine for brushing

directions.step:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Lightly grease baking pan and set aside. Place chicken breasts between sheets of plastic wrap and pound with meat mallet to 1/4-inch thickness. Set aside
Place apples, raisins, nuts, onion, and sage in bowl and stir to combine. Place 1 tablespoon apple mixture in center of each breast ad roll up, enclosing filling completely. Secure with wooden toothpicks and place, seam-side-down, in single layer in prepared pan. Brush with melted butter and set aside.
To make glaze, melt 4 tablespoons butter in small saucepan and stir in apple jelly, orange juice, and sherry. Simmer 3 minutes until jelly is completely melted.
Bake chicken in preheated oven, basting frequently with glaze, 30-45 minutes or until no longer pink inside. Remove toothpicks before serving.
(Recipe from Gold Kist Farms)
